text:
🗞️@pfizer told @USATODAY that it expects to nearly slice in half the amount of time it takes to produce a batch of #Covid19 #vaccine from 110 days to an avg. of 60 days. The #pharma company calls it "Project Light Speed."
➡️https://t.co/86ILMooN4p

#Pfizer #BioNTechSE #pharmanews https://t.co/SRPb3teLOw
